com.ibm.watson.dsm.engine.parser.sql

Class DSMSQLDefinition

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.watson.dsm.engine.parser.sql.DSMSQLDefinition

  • public class DSMSQLDefinition
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides storage and management functions for the statements from an SQL-based DSM rule file.
    Author:
    dawood

      • getIdentifiers

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getIdentifiers(DSMSQLStatement.StatementType type)

        Parameters:
        type -
        Returns:
        never null, and a list without duplicates.

      • getClauseStatement

        public java.util.List<DSMSQLStatement> getClauseStatement(DSMSQLStatement.StatementType type,
                                                 StatementModifier.StatementModifierType[] withMod,
                                                 StatementModifier.StatementModifierType[] withoutMod)
        Get the clause statements with
        1. identifiers that appear in the section of the given type,
        2. does have a modifier of the optionally given type, and
        3. does NOT have a modifier of the optionally given type.
        So for example, you can request all clauses that refer to Persistent declaration statements.
        Parameters:
        type - one of Persistent, Transient or Transport. May be null to select all types.
        withMod - may be null. Or it may be None, which case the statement should have no modifiers.
        withoutMod - may be null.
        Returns:
        never null

      • getStatements

        public java.util.List<DSMSQLStatement> getStatements(DSMSQLStatement.StatementType type,
                                            java.lang.String id)
        Get the statements of the given type and having the given identifier. If the statement type is one of Persistent, Input, Transient, Transport, then the returned list should probably only have 1 item in
        Parameters:
        type -
        id -
        Returns:
        null if none found.

      • getDeclaredIdType

        public DSMSQLStatement.StatementType getDeclaredIdType(java.lang.String id)
        Get the type of the id from one of Persistent, Actoin, Input, Transient or Transport types.
        Parameters:
        id - statement identifier
        Returns:
        null if statement's id is not found in the table definitions.
        Throws:
        DSMException

      • getBlockCount

        public int getBlockCount()
        Get the number of blocks declared in the clause statements. Minimum will always be 1 unless there are no clauses.
        Returns:
        1 or larger, or 0 if there are no clauses.

      • getPrimaryTable

        public java.lang.String getPrimaryTable(java.lang.String prevTable)
        Find the primary table for the given previous table. This means looking for a persistent table that has a modifier with a value that matches the given table name.
        Parameters:
        prevTable -
        Returns:
        null if not found.
